word: There are only two classes in the world today, and only two classes will be recognized in the judgment--those who violate God's law and those who obey it. Christ gives the test by which we prove our loyalty or disloyalty. "If ye love me," He says, "keep my commandments. . . . He that hath my commandments, and keepeth them, he it is that loveth me ..." (John 14:15-21).
